name: The 10th International Conference on Culture, Languages and Literature
content: Publication Information: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference committees and accepted papers will be published in the following journals: 1\. International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL) ISSN: 2382-6282 (Print); 2972-3108 (Online) Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJLLL Indexed by:CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref 2\. International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) Frequency:Monthly DOI:10.18178/IJIET Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2022: 2.0), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Google Scholar
